医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
食用花卉绽放对健康有益研究分析了四种食用花卉的生物活性化合物、抗氧化活性和香气特征，有助于了解它们的营养和健康价值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Edible-flowers-bloom-with-health-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Edible-flowers-bloom-with-health-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af84bbbd-7264-4f36-8ec2-acb69262a32d Fri, 22 Mar 2024 00:25:00 -0400 Edible flowers bloom with health benefits
研究探索植物性饮食中抗性淀粉的健康益处该评论评估了抗性淀粉在促进健康及其通过食品加工方法保持健康方面的作用，强调了当前膳食摄入量的差距以及通过增加植物性食品中抗性淀粉的消耗来改善全球健康的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Research-explores-the-health-benefits-of-pressive-starch-in-plant-based-diets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Research-explores-the-health-benefits-of-pressive-starch-in-plant-based-diets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=959cd5d8-8bc8-47ed-bff9-f54d0d0e5b8f Fri, 22 Mar 2024 00:02:00 -0400 Research explores the health benefits of resistant starch in plant-based diets
LungVax 疫苗利用 DNA 技术预防肺癌LungVax 疫苗由牛津大学、弗朗西斯·克里克研究所和伦敦大学学院的科学家开发，采用的技术类似于非常成功的牛津/阿斯利康 COVID-19 疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/LungVax-vaccine-uses-DNA-technology-to-prevent-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/LungVax-vaccine-uses-DNA-technology-to-prevent-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a282c0f-0a32-4644-8579-225bbaa10616 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 23:54:00 -0400 LungVax vaccine uses DNA technology to prevent lung cancer
性传播感染中抗生素耐药性不断上升：呼吁全球采取行动该评论深入探讨了性传播感染中抗菌素耐药性日益严峻的挑战，强调了创新治疗的必要性以及全球监测在管理淋病和梅毒等疾病方面的关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Rising-antimicrobial-resistance-in-STI-A-call-for-global-action.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Rising-antimicrobial-resistance-in-STI-A-call-for-global-action.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e105729f-713f-4399-aa8c-b6c76223c146 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 23:47:00 -0400 Rising antimicrobial resistance in STIs: A call for global action
长基因与更快的生物衰老有关是什么导致我们的身体衰老？四项补充研究，包括西北医学的一项研究，得出了相同的结论：长基因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Long-genes-linked-to-faster-biological-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Long-genes-linked-to-faster-biological-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc67d324-d042-4a04-9a5b-dfc8f0b4c54a Thu, 21 Mar 2024 23:17:16 -0400 Long genes linked to faster biological aging
您看得出来差别吗？研究探讨了人工智能生成的食物图像与真实食物图像的吸引力食品质量和偏好研究探讨了人工智能生成的食品图像与真实食品图像的区别和吸引力，揭示了对消费者认知的洞察以及图像披露对吸引力的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Can-you-spot-the-difference-Study-explores-the-appeal-of-AI- generated-vs-real-food-images.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Can-you-spot-the-difference-Study-explores-the-appeal-of-AI- generated-vs-real-food-images.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16f41840-78eb-441a-b0eb-85dd9a3a3cbb Thu, 21 Mar 2024 23:14:00 -0400 Can you spot the difference? Study explores the appeal of AI-generated vs. real food images
采取行动保护加州室内工人免受成本问题带来的高温影响州长加文·纽瑟姆(Gavin Newsom)政府出人意料地撤回了对一项全面提案的支持，该提案将保护数百万加州室内工人免受危险的高温影响，并表示在不知道该州预计成本的情况下不能批准该提案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Move-to-protect-Californiae28099s-indoor-workers-from-heat-upend-by-cost-questions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Move-to-protect-Californiae28099s-indoor-workers-from-heat-upend-by-cost-questions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ceb67928-58fe-4bcb-88ce-5c964dc054cb Thu, 21 Mar 2024 23:08:06 -0400 Move to protect California’s indoor workers from heat upended by cost questions
研究揭示了女性月经周期、情绪和睡眠模式之间的联系最新研究表明，女性的睡眠模式会受到干扰，并且在经期前几天会感到更加愤怒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Study-sheds-new-light-on-the-link- Between-womens-menstrual-cycles-emotions-and-sleep-patterns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Study-sheds-new-light-on-the-link- Between-womens-menstrual-cycles-emotions-and-sleep-patterns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8740f3c7-2690-4a40-9df6-5becebb703d1 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 23:06:18 -0400 Study sheds new light on the link between women's menstrual cycles, emotions, and sleep patterns
芝加哥儿童面临饮用水中广泛的铅暴露问题《美国医学会儿科杂志》(JAMA Pediatrics) 的研究表明，芝加哥六岁以下儿童通过饮用水普遍存在铅暴露，暴露和检测率的差异凸显了有针对性的公共卫生干预措施的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Chicagos-children-face-widespread-lead-exposure-in-drinking-water.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Chicagos-children-face-widespread-lead-exposure-in-drinking-water.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1430320d-b552-49ed-96f1-447c3b0d6f5c Thu, 21 Mar 2024 22:52:00 -0400 Chicago's children face widespread lead exposure in drinking water
研究人员设计出制造人类人工染色体的新技术能够在人类细胞内工作的人类人工染色体（HAC）可以为先进的基因疗法提供动力，包括针对某些癌症的疗法以及许多实验室应用，尽管严重的技术障碍阻碍了它们的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Researchers-devise-novel-technique-for-crafting- human-artificial-chromosomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240321/Researchers-devise-novel-technique-for-crafting- human-artificial-chromosomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02395a6f-d9bd-4681-a4e4-a7fb3d731599 Thu, 21 Mar 2024 19:30:00 -0400 Researchers devise novel technique for crafting human artificial chromosomes
